Title: With Great Power: The Stan Lee Story
Director: Terry Dougas, Nikki Frakes, Will Hess
Actors: Avi Arad, Jim Goodkind, Jeremy Piven, Sean Astin
Plot: A feature length documentary on the life and creations of Stan Lee. Stan Lee is the co-creator of Spider-Man, Hulk, X-Men, Fantastic Four, Iron Man and over 200 other characters that can be found in comic books, movie screens, and in retail stores around the world.
